workDescription: Crafting UI Components for Common Platform Library using ReactJs, TypeScript, StoryBook and Figma.
Designed Wireframe on Figma and built the UI for Performance Monitoring Dashboard of Grievance Officers.
Developed interactive elements to the Dashboard charts using jQuery and jQuery-UI libraries.
Worked with Ajax and REST API to generate JSON responses from the DB for the Performance Dashboard.
Facilitated PG Form Extraction via Python Automation to supply questions to the PG WhatsApp chatbot.
Crafted UI design on Figma by comparing 10+ players in the HR and Outsourcing industry.
Built Front-End with Bootstrap to interact with its users(Corporates and Jobseekers).
Created Back-End in Model-View-Controller Architecture using Django, and Database in MySQL.
Deployed the app on a Linux Cloud server(Digital Ocean) to facilitate scalability at a later stage. (<a href='http://depute.in' target='_blank' className='text-blue-500 underline'>depute.in<a/>)

projects.projectTitle: Sugriva (Hiring Management Solution for Solopreneurs) — ReactJs+Redux, NodeJs
description: Full Stack app with 2 distinct views - Recruiter View & Candidate View for efficient interaction.
Built-in Video Interview feature using Socket.io and PeerJS enables smooth and real-time video interviews.
Leveraged Socket.io for Text Chat for message exchange during Interview.
Developed ExpressJs server for handling Auth+Form submission APIs & concurrent Socket.io events+callbacks.
Leveraged MongoDB database to store and manage candidate and interview data securely.
Implemented Protected Routes to ensure authenticated and authorized access to the application.
Created Python script utilizing the YouTube Data API to fetch comments from Journalists' prime show videos for unsupervised sentiment analysis and Journalist Ranking. (GitHub)
Utilized Twitter API v2 to fetch Hindi tweets with hashtags related to Adani & Hindenburg, training a Hindi language-based sentiment classifier. (GitHub)
Full Stack Micro-Blogging App with CRUD operations on Posts by Users, and Anonymous Commenting.
Added functionality of Automatic Caption Generation for the images fulfilled by the Pre-trained RNN Model.
Crafted the UI in HTML, CSS, and Backend in Django for smooth integration with the Trained Model.

descriptions: Competed in 600+ Questions on Leetcode with a Daily Streak of 300+ days and a Contest Rating of 1501.
Attended Urban Company on-Campus BootCamp series & won Exclusive Goodies.

Programming/Tools & Technologies: Javascript, jQuery, ReactJs with Redux, ExpressJs, HTML, CSS, C++, Python-Django, Linux, Git, Google Colab, Jupyter Notebook, BeautifulSoup, Selenium, Figma, WordPress.
